Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
The first movie chronologically, this movie tells the story of how Obi-Wan Kenobi first found Anakin Skywalker, the "Chosen One", and the events that lead to him joining the Jedi Order.

Set ten years after the first movie, this tells the story of how Anakin grows into his role in the Order, and is also the beginning of the Clone Wars (a rather good animated adaptation of the Clone Wars exists).

This is the movie that rounds out the prequels, and it tells the story of Anakin\'s fall to the Dark Side. Manipulated by Darth Sidious, he turns on his old master and the Jedi Order in order to save his wife from dying. This culminates with him becoming Darth Vader.

The first of the Star Wars movies to be released, it tells the story of Luke Skywalker. He joins the Rebellion and meets Princess Leia, old man Obi-Wan, ruggedly handsome rogue Han Solo and his companion Chewbacca.
Luke\'s story continues in this movie, where he learns more of the ways of the Force from Master Yoda. He also faces off with Darth Vader, and learns something very important about his origins.

Luke tries to retrieve his comrade Han Solo from the clutches of Jabba the Hutt, and also leads a war against the Empire. He faces off with the man who turned his father to the Dark Side, and finally frees the Galaxy from the clutches of the Sith.

The new trilogy introduces us to Rey, Finn, Poe Dameron and Kylo Ren. Kylo Ren is Darth Vader\'s grandson and desperately trying to live up to his name. A new threat has taken over the galaxy in the ashes of the Empire.

Rey has found Luke Skywalker, and is attempting to learn from him. However, Luke is reluctant, and feels the galaxy would be better off without the Jedi. Kylo Ren and Rey deepen their relationship, and there are major shifts in the power balance.

Taking place between Episode III and Episode IV, this movie tells the tale of Jyn Erso, the daughter of the creator of the Death Star. She helps the rebels acquire the plans, and tries to get her father back from the Empire that kidnapped him.
